title: New GitHub Features for Issues Tracking — and Memories of Its Past
author: David Cassel
description: On Oct. 1, GitHub launched a public beta for a "major evolution of issues and projects," promising highly requested enhancements that "make it easier than ever to break down work, visualize progress, categorize and find just the right issue in GitHub."
cntitle: GitHub 问题跟踪的新功能——以及对往昔的回忆
cndescription: 10 月 1 日，GitHub 推出了“问题和项目重大演变”的公开测试版，承诺提供高度需要的增强功能，使“在 GitHub 上分解工作、可视化进度、分类和查找正确的问题比以往更容易”。
